page.title: 20AUTHORS
page.content: The work on farming,old houses,facilities and Gala Week was done by pupils from St.Augustine's High School,Edinburgh:Simon Donoghue,Grant Phillips,Tony Neilson,John O'Rourke ,Paul Falconer,Elisa Stanton,Le Phuong Tang,Sandra Pilley,Julie Kerr,Le Hong Tang,Tom Paton,Paul McAusland. The work on the village,canal and quarries was done by pupils from Ratho Primary school:Ralph Spencer,Saron Lease,Gillian Munro,Nichola Erskine,Mark McCullough,Judith Crosby,Gwen Hunter,Claire Fraser,David Gilchrist,Suzi Wilson,Karen Wright,Stuart Kelly,Ewan Spencer,Jimmy Scribner,Andrew Robertson and Angela Hunter.
